enhanced_description: Emp Trust provides a comprehensive suite of next-generation workforce management solutions, specifically specializing in employee onboarding software. The platform is designed to streamline operations, optimize workforce efficiency, and ensure regulatory adherence globally. It supports organizations by simplifying crucial HR processes like I-9 and E-Verify compliance, facilitating remote onboarding, managing policies through an easy-to-use hub, and reducing time-to-hire with an integrated Applicant Tracking System. Serving over 850 customers in 52 countries, including 24 Fortune 500 companies, Emp Trust empowers organizations to focus on growth and productivity by automating compliance and managing employee resources effectively.
